a2

Class Directory

  • java.lang.Object
    • a2.Directory

  • public class Directory
extends java.lang.Object
    Emulates a directory in a file system. Emulates a directory in a file system. Has a name, a parent directory it resides within and a path from the root. Contains sets of directories and files.
    Author:
    Ken Lee

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Directory()
      Default constructor
      Directory(Directory p, java.lang.String n)
      Constructor for a directory with both a name and a parent directory.
      Directory(java.lang.String n)
      Constructor for a directory that only has a name.

      Deletes a File from the set containing it in its parent Directory.

        public void addDirectory(Directory d)
        Adds a Directory to a Directory. Adds a Directory to a Directory. Sets the parent of the Directory being added as the Directory it's being added to. Updates the path of the Directory being added.
        Parameters:
